steps.description: Step 1: Navigate to Excel Web - Ensure we're on Excel Web with authentication - User navigated to Excel Web interface, authentication required
Step 2: Click New Workbook - Click the 'Blank workbook' text to create a new workbook - User clicked 'Blank workbook' to create new Excel document

steps.step_name: Wait for Excel to Launch in New Window
steps.description: Step 3: Wait for Excel to Launch in New Window - Wait for Excel to launch in new window after clicking 'Blank workbook' - System waited for Excel to launch in new window/iframe
Step 4: Dismiss Copilot Dialog - Dismiss the 'Start with Copilot' dialog that appears when creating a new workbook - Unwanted Copilot dialog appeared, user had to dismiss it manually
Step 5: Take Screenshot - Initial State - Capture initial workbook state - System captured screenshot for visual analysis
Step 6: Enter Sample Data - Enter sample data in cells using canvas approach - User entered sample data in Excel cells
Step 7: Take Screenshot - Data Entered - Capture workbook with data entered - System captured screenshot for visual analysis
Step 8: Click Save Button - Click the save button to save the workbook - User clicked save button, save dialog appeared
Step 9: Take Screenshot - Final State - Capture final workbook state after save - System captured screenshot for visual analysis

base_craft_bugs.title: Multiple Dialog Interruptions
base_craft_bugs.description: Scenario was interrupted by 2 dialogs, creating a fragmented user experience
base_craft_bugs.recommendation: Minimize dialog interruptions and implement smoother workflow transitions
